description: Agroprovidencia is an initiative aimed at enhancing food security and sovereignty in the islands of Providencia. Established in 2019, it focuses on empowering local farming families through education, project management, and community engagement. The initiative promotes the cultivation of traditional crops, supports local markets, and fosters generational knowledge transfer among children and adults. By collaborating with various organizations, Agroprovidencia seeks to revitalize agricultural practices and ensure sustainable food production for the community.
name: Agroprovidencia
